xuiScrollService
service in module xui

Description

Service that provides scroll notifications for both native scrolling (i.e. $window) as well as xui-scrollbar.

Methods

  • bind(scrollCallback)

    Invokes the specified callback on scroll events.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    scrollCallbackxui.IScrollCallback

    The callback to invoke on scroll events.

  • unbind(scrollCallback)

    Ensures the specified callback is no longer invoked on scroll events.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    scrollCallbackxui.IScrollCallback

    The callback to unbind.
